alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Havana, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Macon Community Park, Darsey, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Scotland, Iamonia, Killearn Estates, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Hinson, Forest Meadows Park and Lake Talquin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
